snippet: HSIA--Sven E. The Board of Managers of East Side House Settlement express our deepest sorrow at the passing of our friend and benefactor, Sven E. Hsia. A member of the Board since 1985, former treasurer and current chairman of the Investment Committee, Mr. Hsia was an integral part of the heart and soul of East Side House. He will be missed. Thomas H. Remien, President John A. Sanchez, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: HSIA--Sven E. The Board of Managers of East Side House Settlement express our deepest sorrow at the passing of our friend and benefactor, Sven E. Hsia. A member of the Board since 1985, former treasurer and current chairman of the Investment Committee, Mr. Hsia was an integral part of the heart and soul of East Side House. He will be missed. Thomas H. Remien, President John A. Sanchez, Executive Director 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HSIA, SVEN E
